Category

  Создать новую категорию
Id Name
{{ category.id }} {{ category.name }}
import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'category-data', templateUrl: './category.component.html' }) export class CategoryComponent { public categories: ItemDetails[] = []; constructor(http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') baseUrl: string) { http.get(baseUrl + 'Category').subscribe(result => { this.categories = result; console.log(this.categories); }, error => console.error(error)); } } interface ItemDetails { id: string; name: number; }
